title: Bug 21834: Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout
description: Bug 21834: Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout on Build 2002071610021.
OB: When pressing the Delete button, the first item on the second row is deleted. However, the entire second row is also removed when the delete occurs.
EB: When pressing the Delete button, only the first item on the second row should be deleted. The second row should remain unchanged.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Run the attached test case. 2. Drag the Open Type coolitem to the second row (last coolItem). 3. Drag the Launch coolitem (last coolItem on first row) to the second row, placing it after the Open Type item. 4. Drag the Search coolitem to the second row, placing it after the Launch coolitem. 5. Drag the Script coolitem to the second row (last coolItem on first row), placing it after the Search coolitem. 6. Press the Delete button. This will delete the first item on the second row. Notice that the entire second row is removed when the delete occurs. The second row should remain unchanged.
